description: Red Raven is the name of three separate characters from Marvel Comics: The original Red Raven, a flying superhero. He appeared in print once in 1940, then not again until 1968, and occasionally since then. The second Red Raven, named Dania, a flying superhero and daughter of the original Red Raven. She first appeared in print in 1992, and occasionally since then. Redford Raven, a Wild West villain who owned a set of mechanical wings and was called Red Raven. He has appeared in print three times, in 1964, 1985, and 1987.
name: Red Raven
powers: Flight using mechanical wings. Access to alien technology. Skilled hand-to-hand combatant
